page.title: 05Games Children Play
page.content: {Games}are part of our recreation. We play games for fun. We are 10 years old.{Ariana}and older children like an {indoor}guessing game called{detective. A detective is sent out whilst somebody is chosen to be the suspect. The suspect tries to escape from the detective by moving. The others try to protect the suspect by copying every movement.Other indoor games include hunting like hunt the thimble and pencil games such as hangman. {Outdoor}games include skipping and ball games.{Joanna}and younger children like{Mr Gingle.}Every one says " Goodmorning Mr Gingle" bow, then ask what are you doing Mr Gingle? "Stirring my pot what do you think?" You say things like a sock. He answers yes or no. When he says "A big fat brownie",he tries to catch you. If you are caught you help him catch the rest
